alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 1:57AM MST until March 06 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 7 inches. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
